attributes.action: Place teenages who do street crime to be placed in military service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With knife crime and gun crime in the news, we shou8ld petition the idea of placing these offenders into military service instead of jail.  After 5 years service they get a clean slate and have better career prospects for life.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
